name: Cutthroats!
description:
Title: Cutthroats!

Platform: Print to Play

Genre: Board Game

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 10 and Up, Casual Gamers

Game Overview: 

Cutthroats is a board game where you play as a pirate! Compete against other players as you collect or steal treasure from fellow pirates. Survive against your foes as your ship sinks down to the blimey deep. Quickly run across the board and outwit your foes before you sink to the Ocean's abyss. Win by being the last of the pirates standing, and watch out for the artifacts on the ship, for their power can change the game with a flick of a doubloon. Print out the pdfs at the bottom of the page and grab a six-sided die to play!

Instructions:

Download the instructions for the game for more information on how to play.

Game Design Team:
